description: Try our easy to follow Pork Katsu Bento Box recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sandwich,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Aug 2020,Back to school,High protein,High fibre,Mandarin,Sweet potato,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Cauliflower
name: Pork Katsu Bento Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs reduced-salt and reduced-sugar barbecue sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Process oats, cauliflower, potato and parmesan in a food processor until mixture resembles breadcrumbs.
Rub pork in mustard, then coat in crumb mixture. Place on tray, spray with oil, then bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool completely.
Sandwich cabbage, pork and sauce between bread slices and cut in half. Transfer to bento boxes along with snacks.
